_sText: A little map I made, just for fun. Play solo or multi. I hope you like that :)

MG VELOCITY TOWER

MAP INFO

A tower level with a water conveyer belt around the outside. Weapons can be found around the map with the more powerfull weapons in harder to reach places (good luck getting the autosniper). I hope this map has some playability as I love flying around with a M3 blasting players on top of the tower in the head, so hope players actually enjoy the level. One secret on this level which is a player trail, you can find this by surfing under one of the four towers around the outside. On one corner there is a blue and white texture on a corner of the top floor. Hit the underside of it to get teleported.

Change Log

v1 First version of map released. v2 Added in a bomb site that becomes active 30 seconds into the round. Simplified some brush work on some of the outsides of the map. Added in some physics boxes in the main tower room (bomb site). Added water under the elevators as a fail safe in case the elevators ever bug and players fall through. v3 Bomb site is now working, had to remove the 30 second cooldown time though.
My first map. I hope you like it, good game!
i not upload the pic of the secret room

WALKTHROUGH:

 LEVEL 1:
  
     Jump over water and shoot the graffiti to the left and fall in a hole below it. Press the button and the glass above will break. Press the button where the glass broke to break the cylinder. Go back into the water and swim all the way to the bottom until you fall through. Pick a gun and go through the teleporter to the next level.

Level 2:

     Shoot the vents with a gun until you break both of them. Stand as far back in the corner as possible to shoot the red fuse in the back where you shot the vents. You should break another vent below you in the corner or you should automatically fall into it. Shoot the another vent below you. Now figure out the combination of the red fuses by hitting your use key on them until they are all pressed in. The water should rise and you should shoot the upper vent. When the water has fully risen, go far back until you sink in the water a bit, then slowly walk up to one of the lower ledges on each side of the vent. You should hop up automatically without crouch or hitting jump. When your in the air, hit crouch and land on the lower ledge. then simply walk up to the upper ledge where the vent was and walk forward until you fall in a large hole. Find the blueberry in the cherry room and shoot it.
Wait for yourself to teleport.

LEVEL 3:

     Walk into the Sandstone place and jump on the thin line then jump to the other side. Jump on the needle then to the other side. Jump over a trap below you that will break. Have your knife out for this one, you must run as close as you can to the danger signs without getting teleported then at the end move to the left a little to make it without getting teleported. walk forward until a gate opens up in front of you, push up against it until it closes. Press the button (VERY IMPORTANT) then walk out the door. Find a thing on the wall with a picture of a teleporter. There should be a hallway now. Walk into it and go to the teleporter.

LEVEL 4:

     There is an invisible path. follow the red marks above you and try not to fall off the path. At one point when you see 3 of the red dots together you must jump-duck there. when you get to a visible part of the path you should hear a click. wait about 10 seconds before jumping across or you will be pushed off. Once across, go through the teleporter.

LEVEL 5:

     Plant the bomb on the target. Wait until you get teleported to a above overseeing platform in mid-air. You can buy weapons here also. You win when you wait for the bomb to go off. if you shoot the hostage in the glass you get teleported where he just was. (You become the hostage and get blown up)

I'M SEARCHING FOR HELP TO SOLVE A BUG THAT CAUSE PROBLLEMS TO DO THE EASTER EGG TWO TIMES PER MAP.

Here you can fight with the other players under water with knifes! But that's not all!

There is an easter egg, and if you follow this steps, you can decide what to do with the other players! 

1. Destroy the grate in the middle cylinder.

2. Press the button in it.

3. Pick up the hegrendae spawned behind the button.

4. Go to surface.

5. Throw the grenade in front of the door (do not throw it too close to the door)

6. Grab the desert eagle that the red character offers you.

7. Go out of the white place and press the button to close the door.

8. Go to the cylinder again.

9. Shoot to the hidden character behind the button.

10. Go to the surface and shoot to the door. IF YOU ENTER TO THE WHITE PLACE USING NOCLIP YOU WILL UNDERSTAND BETTER WHERE YOU HAVE TO SHOOT. 

11. Pick up the P90 that character dropped and shoot on the new chracter's (that spawned in water) head. 

    In case this character appears without you trying to make the easter egg you have to grab it as soon as possible and shoot on the head of 

the other player who owns the p90.

12. After being teleported to a place similar to Super Smash Flash, you will find the same person you shot over the head or vice versa and you 

will have to give him a rematch. In a battle with the same conditions as in step 11 with a different gravity.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION: The middle button changes gravity.

If I were you, the first thing I would do if you won the battle similar to the super smash flash, it would go for the player who lost who is in 

a wooden construction on the other side of the island that can be destroyed by many bulllets.

There is a hidden button behind the yellow statue.

So this map includes a lot of game modes in it!

Fixed practically every bug known to mg_ultimate_challenge_beta (or mg_leech_ultimate_challenge is the bsp).
Had some bugs which included server crashes (nades on lvl 4 if thrown), fps lag issues with people spamming the buttons on lvl 4, etc.

Level 1 - Invisible Maze (I had some complaints with it "being too hard" or "impossible"... it is possible... it is alot simpler maze than you think... in the end didn't change anything with that level)
Level 2 - Jumping
Level 3 - Grenades
Level 4 - Accuracy
Level 5 - Teamwork
Level 6 - Timing

Server side details:
sv_airaccelerate 100 (should already be set by default most likely)
change mp_roundtime (make it infinite round time limit or change it so that it is at least 10 minutes long... 5 minute default settings is wayyyy too short to complete the entire map... 10 minutes is even pushing it but it can be done)
friendly fire off (most mg servers have this defaulted)

Mods:
NOBLOCK
***This is the only mod you need.  If you do NOT have NOBLOCK Mod then you and your teammates will end up getting stuck when teleporting.  That mod is a must!***

This map is now a fully functional map.
I will be making another mg map sometime in the near future (hopefully), so if you have any suggestions or ideas, pm me.
Enjoy.

This was my very first map using the Hammer Editor.
I went on winter break for my college and decided to fool around with that editor.
Fooling around with it led to ideas, and my ideas eventually ended up in my very own map.
For my very first map, this isn't a bad turnout to my expectations for my own.
I think I got rid of all of the bugs, although there might be one or two flaws in the gameplay portion of it, but for the most part there shouldn't be any crashes or anything of that sort.
I made sure that the map is completable on both sides (T and CT) as well as making it so that not one side has an advantage over the other.
Nevertheless, here is my map.
I'll give you details about it (below) and please give me feedback for future references when I make a map.

**NOBLOCK Mod (or whatever you call it) is a must... otherwise you will end up getting stuck inside of eachother.**

***Also... the unique thing is that even if you can't complete a certain challenge, as long as one of your teammates completes it (except for the 6th challenge) then you can move onto the next challenge via a teleporter somewhere in the beginning of that level.***

1st Level - Invisible Maze
2nd Level - Jumping (****Just a note!  I made the walls translucent for a reason.  I did it that way so that they can see where the walls are as well as seeing the other team's progress.  I would've done a clear wall but I couldn't figure out which texture that was. Doh!****)
3rd Level - Grenades
4th Level - Accuracy
5th Level - Teamwork
6th Level - Timing

Enjoy!

***IMPORTANT***
After playing it with several people on a server I noticed a few things wrong with it.
For one thing, I never changed the time limit.  So, pretty much you have 5 mins to complete the whole map, which I intended was at least 10+ mins for completion.
Found one bug as well... if you throw a nade on the accuracy level (level 4), it may cause a server crash.  That happened once on the server I was playing on.
In conclusion, don't judge me solely on this version of it... I will be fixing it so that it works.  Following, I will release the final version of it whenever I all of the problems are fixed.

This is my first map.I hope you will like it.

Sorry for bad english.

Firstly, I’d like to state that this is my first CS:S map that I’ve released, I normally make maps for HL2. 

So, basically, this map is a plant/defuse map which has the Ts starting at the bottom of the two towers and the CTs starting at the top. There are two bomb sites, one at the top of tower 1, and the other at the bottom of tower 2, however tower 2 can only be accessed via the top of tower 1.

There are quite a few different ways for the Ts to get up such as, taking the elevator, climbing up through the elevator shaft, taking various vent systems, or climbing across the tower’s ledges. Once the elevator reaches the top, a vent on top of the elevator will open before the doors do, giving you the choice to take a different route to the top. If for some reason the elevator gets jammed, the vent on top of the lift will open, allowing the Ts to climb out into the elevator shaft where they can take the ladders instead.

It’s also possible for the CTs to get to the bottom as well but is much harder than it is for Ts to get up; it requires them to climb down the side of one of the towers, making their way across small ledges in order to reach ground level.

The second time i loaded it up, it wasn't bright, but the cubemaps still didn't work... I'm not sure how to fix this because it works with the original one, but not with the one i uploaded which is an exact copy of the original :\
If anyone knows why, can you please tell me and ill fix it...

Hi this my Tron bike mix. 

How to play?

1. Vote for a map.
2. Pick Tron bike and start race.
3. You lose 5 sec if you destroy the bike.
4. Press left mouse when you have boost and press Special weapon to exit.
5. Every lap you race you get 1 point.
6. The winner will pick best weapon and pick a fight map.
7. I have made 4 race map and 5 fight maps. 

Tel me what you like and don't like and i will try fix next time. If you want me to make more race maps and some fight maps tel me, ore if you want make race map i can help.

have fun

mg_trampoline_kk 

Spawnpoints: 32 (16 CT, 16 T) 

I made this map before knowing about other mg_trampoline maps, so i didn't steal any ideas or copied a map or something... 
===========================================

***Gameplay***

This map is realy fun! If the round starts every player has to jump down. If someone stays in the spawn area, 30 secounds after the round started, he will probably die because of an AFK Killer. After the players jumped down the will hit the trampoline on the ground and fly up again. They are equipped with a knife and a pumpgun and have to fight in the air while jumping. 

If some players still live after 230 secounds they have to continue the fight underwater because the room gets flooded. 

============================================

***Features*** 

There is a background music that starts at roundstart. There are lights everywhere in the map and they fit with the music. Example: If there is a fast loud part in the music, some lights will turning off and some others will do a fast strobo. 
So while the players are jumping on the trampoline they can enjoy the lightshow. 

=============================================

This is my first minigame map ever so please remember that if you're gonna vote or comment this map. 

Thanks and i hope you enjoy! 

(Music: Zatox - Andromeda)

==============================================

Changelog v2: 

-added weapon_m3
-added unbreakable glass for spawn protection (glass will hide in the wall after 30 secounds)

Welcome to mg train assault !!!

Gameplay:

There is an attack team and a defense team. 
The attack team must hacking a button to open the train door and capture the train.
The Defense team must defense the train for 5 minutes to win the round.
After each round the teams will change sides.


About the map: 

-Respawn Script for respawning after death

-No Buyzone, but you can find weapons with respawn

-Pickups: Health Kits, Mega Health Kits and Speed Boost

-Unreal Tournament music

-Inspired by Unreal Tournament


SCRIPT
***********
Required plugin for Train Assault Map. The plugin controls the respawn of the players and the team switch on the end of the round.

REQUIREMENTS FOR PLAY WITH RESPAWN SCRIPT !!!
************
- Sourcemod 1.3+ 
- Requirement for Sourcemod: Metamod:Source 1.8+ Download Link ---) (www.sourcemod.net)


Have Fun !!!

mg_towerdefence_v1
A Tower Defence map where one team must make there way around the winding path, while the other team must stop them from reaching the end by killing them. This map is more than just running, it requires tactics in order for each team to win. Without teamwork or someone calling which players to attack/ how to stack the classes then you will struggle. This map was for a allinone collab map that never materialised, out limit was like 8% on everything for the collab map, which is why its pretty basic in terms of looks.
Map Info
  • Random team selection. (Random if your attacking or defending)
  • Choose your own tower when defending.
  • The attackers get to choose from 3 classes:
    • Fast Class = | 3150 Health | 1.3x Speed| RED
    • Regular Class = | 4150 Health | 1x Speed | GREEN
    • Tank Class = | 7300 Health | 0.8x Speed | BLUE
This map requires team work and co-operation, when we was beta testing on a 30-40 slot server the map was as balanced as it probably will get. Not too sure what the gameplay is like when there are less than 15 players, maybe not so balanced. If you would like to try this map visit steamgamers minigames server @ STEAMGAMERS.COM | MiniGames | *Funtastic* @ 72.26.196.164:27015
We did try to set it up where you get lifes, so that the attackers must get X amount of players though depending on the amount of players in the server, but it was too hard t to get balanced that way.
 GL HF
Feel free to message me with any questions by joining the following group and opening a chat with me @ [SG] Pauls Group

I have been working on this game mode for about a week now.

I have always been loved the Titan mode in battlefield 2142 and with the release of the Titan mode adaption for BF4 around the corner, thought I would create a map for CS:S.

It is adapted to suit the capabilities of Source (Titans are replaced with bases etc) but the objectives remain the same.

How to play
===========
Titan mode is very similar to conquest in the way the game is played. Players must take control of the missile control points and hold them for as long as possible. Once a missile control point has been captured, the missile batteries will fire a missile at the enemy Titan every 60 seconds unless interrupted (base changes ownership etc).

Each Titan is equipped with 15 hit points: 5 Shield and 10 hull. While the shield of a Titan is still active, players cannot enter the base. When the shield is destroyed however, the enemy team can assault the base from the inside out or continue to hold the control points to win the round.

The inside of the base has 2 power generators that need to be destroyed before access to the core is given. A player must press the override button and remain in the activation point for 10 seconds to arm the bomb.

Once both stations have been destroyed, players can the access the core where they can blow it up using their guns. Each hit of the core has 1500hp, so multiple people are recommended for attacking.

When the core is destroyed, a new func breakable will spawn until the Titan's hull reachs 0%.


Features
========

### The Helicopter
The helicopter is something I normally don't like to add to a map due to the buggy-ness of source multi-player, but I found a solution to fix this.

When a player walks up to the coloured door on the helicopter and presses E, they are teleported to a console that replicates the inside cockpit of the chopper. When they press E on the control panel, their view is moved to the chopper with a point viewcontroller and they can control the chopper as normal. 

This stops players from falling out of the chopper while they are driving.


### Boats
There are 3 boats on each team. Each boat has an ignition system before you can drive it to allow for reuse. The boats also stop and disable so you can use them as outposts when assulting/defending a control point.


### Voice Overs
I have added voice overs that will announce when a base is captured, a shield is destroyed and a round is won. There is also a client side how to play button on each spawn. When a player presses this button a voice over is played on their client (not to everyone) telling them how to play the map.

### Respawn Script
The plugin attached to the download requires no adjustments or commands etc as it automatically loads when the server loads.

It will respawn players every 8 seconds when the titan mode map is active and will automatically stay dormant when other maps are active.

Source Mod is required to run this script.

### Teleporters
Each base is equipped with 4 teleporters. The teleporters can be accessed when a base is taken, for quick entrance back into the game (just like in battlefield). There is also a teleporter that sends you to the island closest to your base, so you can easily contest the point closes to you for balance.

Teleporters will disable when you lose a position.

Please report any bugs that you find so I can fix them.

Thank you,
